document_data.name: A Trio of Trumpets
document_data.mainbody: '''A Trio of Trumpets''' was a signature dish from the [[Singing Sprite]] inn of [[Secomber]].
document_data.Description: The dish consisted of three hands-length horn-shaped [[cracker]]s, fried to a crisp. They were stuffed with melted white [[cheese]], chopped [[nut]]s, and fried [[mushroom]]s.
document_data.Availability: A Trio of Trumpets was a signature dish served at the Singing Sprite inn, alongside [[Three Crabs]] and the [[Hungry Knight]].
